title: Find LinkedIn profile of Professors and collect details of their Education and Employment History
snippet:
I need someone who are expert in finding the LinkedIn profile given the Name, Email and the University they work for. The second part will be fill the details in spreadsheet of the Education and the Work History for each individual.

If you think you are ready to do apply with the word LinkedIn expert and your skype to start the application.

Don't apply for this job if you cant do a trial file of 50 emails (The project has about 30000 emails)

Thanks
Vinu
